m_szDocSumamry: Conservatives Concerned about Climate Change Stepping It Up July 15th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     Former Republican Congressman Bob Inglis (who was ousted by the Tea Party) is, as far as I can tell, a true climate hawk. Some of the best speeches I’ve seen on climate change have come from him. Unfortunately, he’s essentially been kicked out of Republican national-level politics as a result of this.
